descdev2: from 2020 to 2025. Passionate about web and mobile development, I am looking for a final year project starting in mid-December 2024.
aboutDesc: Currently seeking a final year project to complete my Computer Science Engineering degree. I am a dedicated software developer who enjoys building useful tools and bringing ideas to life. I have gained hands-on experience through numerous group projects and internships, which have sharpened my development skills. I am particularly interested in full-stack web applications but am versatile and open to various types of projects.
